an5.180:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṃ carati mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ.
an5.180:4.2: Addasā kho bhagavā addhānamaggappaṭipanno aññatarasmiṃ padese mahantaṃ sālavanaṃ;
an5.180:4.3: disvāna maggā okkamma yena taṃ sālavanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an5.180:4.4: upasaṅkamitvā taṃ sālavanaṃ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
an5.180:5.2: “ko nu kho hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya?
an5.180:5.4: Atha kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an5.180:5.5: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya?
an5.180:6.1: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, ānanda, imasmiṃ padese nagaraṃ ahosi iddhañceva phītañca bahujanaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ.
an5.180:6.2: Taṃ kho panānanda, nagaraṃ kassapo bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho upanissāya vihāsi.
an5.180:6.3: Kassapassa kho panānanda, bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa gavesī nāma upāsako ahosi sīlesu aparipūrakārī.
an5.180:6.4: Gavesinā kho, ānanda, upāsakena pañcamattāni upāsakasatāni paṭidesitāni samādapitāni ahesuṃ sīlesu aparipūrakārino.
an5.180:6.5: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa upāsakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:6.6: ‘ahaṃ kho imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā, ahañcamhi sīlesu aparipūrakārī, imāni ca pañca upāsakasatāni sīlesu aparipūrakārino.
an5.180:7.1: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesī upāsako yena tāni pañca upāsakasatāni tenupasaṅkami;
an5.180:7.4: Atha kho, ānanda, tesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ etadahosi:
an5.180:7.5: ‘ayyo kho gavesī amhākaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:7.6: Ayyo hi nāma gavesī sīlesu paripūrakārī bhavissati.
an5.180:7.7: Kimaṅgaṃ pana mayan’ti.
an5.180:7.8: Atha kho, ānanda, tāni pañca upāsakasatāni yena gavesī upāsako tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an5.180:7.10: ‘ajjatagge ayyo gavesī imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni sīlesu paripūrakārino dhāretū’ti.
an5.180:7.11: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa upāsakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:7.12: ‘ahaṃ kho imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā, ahañcamhi sīlesu paripūrakārī, imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni sīlesu paripūrakārino.
an5.180:8.1: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesī upāsako yena tāni pañca upāsakasatāni tenupasaṅkami;
an5.180:8.3: ‘ajjatagge maṃ āyasmanto brahmacāriṃ dhāretha ārācāriṃ virataṃ methunā gāmadhammā’ti.
an5.180:8.4: Atha kho, ānanda, tesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ etadahosi:
an5.180:8.5: ‘ayyo kho gavesī amhākaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:8.6: Ayyo hi nāma gavesī brahmacārī bhavissati ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:8.8: Atha kho, ānanda, tāni pañca upāsakasatāni yena gavesī upāsako tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an5.180:8.10: ‘ajjatagge ayyo gavesī imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni brahmacārino dhāretu ārācārino viratā methunā gāmadhammā’ti.
an5.180:8.11: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa upāsakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:8.12: ‘ahaṃ kho imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:8.15: Ahañcamhi brahmacārī ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:8.16: Imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni brahmacārino ārācārino viratā methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:9.1: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesī upāsako yena tāni pañca upāsakasatāni tenupasaṅkami;
an5.180:9.3: ‘ajjatagge maṃ āyasmanto ekabhattikaṃ dhāretha rattūparataṃ virataṃ vikālabhojanā’ti.
an5.180:9.4: Atha kho, ānanda, tesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ etadahosi:
an5.180:9.6: Ayyo hi nāma gavesī ekabhattiko bhavissati rattūparato virato vikālabhojanā.
an5.180:9.8: Atha kho, ānanda, tāni pañca upāsakasatāni yena gavesī upāsako tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an5.180:9.10: ‘ajjatagge ayyo gavesī imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni ekabhattike dhāretu rattūparate virate vikālabhojanā’ti.
an5.180:9.11: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa upāsakassa etadahosi:
an5.180:9.12: ‘ahaṃ kho imesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:9.15: Ahañcamhi brahmacārī ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:9.16: Imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni brahmacārino ārācārino viratā methunā gāmadhammā.
an5.180:9.18: Imānipi pañca upāsakasatāni ekabhattikā rattūparatā viratā vikālabhojanā.
an5.180:10.1: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesī upāsako yena kassapo bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho tenupasaṅkami;
an5.180:10.2: upasaṅkamitvā kassapaṃ bhagavantaṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ etadavoca:
an5.180:10.3: ‘labheyyāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ labheyyaṃ upasampadan’ti.
an5.180:10.4: Alattha kho, ānanda, gavesī upāsako kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa santike pabbajjaṃ, alattha upasampadaṃ.
an5.180:10.5: Acirūpasampanno kho panānanda, gavesī bhikkhu eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
an5.180:10.6: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
an5.180:10.7: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
an5.180:10.8: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti abbhaññāsi.
an5.180:10.9: Aññataro ca panānanda, gavesī bhikkhu arahataṃ ahosi.
an5.180:11.1: Atha kho, ānanda, tesaṃ pañcannaṃ upāsakasatānaṃ etadahosi:
an5.180:11.2: ‘ayyo kho gavesī amhākaṃ bahūpakāro pubbaṅgamo samādapetā.
an5.180:11.3: Ayyo hi nāma gavesī kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajissati.
an5.180:11.5: Atha kho, ānanda, tāni pañca upāsakasatāni yena kassapo bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an5.180:11.6: upasaṅkamitvā kassapaṃ bhagavantaṃ arahantaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ etadavocuṃ:
an5.180:11.7: ‘labheyyāma mayaṃ, bhante, bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyāma upasampadan’ti.
an5.180:11.8: Alabhiṃsu kho, ānanda, tāni pañca upāsakasatāni kassapassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa santike pabbajjaṃ, alabhiṃsu upasampadaṃ.
an5.180:12.1: Atha kho, ānanda, gavesissa bhikkhuno etadahosi:
an5.180:12.2: ‘ahaṃ kho imassa anuttarassa vimuttisukhassa nikāmalābhī homi akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an5.180:12.3: Aho vatimānipi pañca bhikkhusatāni imassa anuttarassa vimuttisukhassa nikāmalābhino assu akicchalābhino akasiralābhino’ti.
an5.180:12.4: Atha kho, ānanda, tāni pañca bhikkhusatāni vūpakaṭṭhā appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharantā nacirasseva—
an5.180:12.5: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
an5.180:12.6: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihariṃsu.
an5.180:12.7: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti abbhaññiṃsu.
an5.180:13.1: Iti kho, ānanda, tāni pañca bhikkhusatāni gavesīpamukhāni uttaruttari paṇītapaṇītaṃ vāyamamānā anuttaraṃ vimuttiṃ sacchākaṃsu.
